title: Senior Platform Architect
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Senior Platform Architect
NICE Actimize is seeking a capable Senior Platform Architect to join our platform team. We are creating a platform that allows the world's largest financial institutions to fight, prevent, and manage financial crimes. In Nice Actimize you will have a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge cloud and AI technologies to build cloud-based services as well as on-premises products. Our platform will be used by software developers to create solutions that fight financial crime and will be used by the biggest financial institutes in the world.
Responsibilities

Participate in the architecture vision and design of the Actimize platform.
Be a technical authority. Design, document, and enforce best practices.
Design and oversee the implementation of end-to-end features.
Cultivate relationships with business stakeholders and maintain in-depth knowledge of strategic business plans.
Educate and support the development teams helping them to resolve complex issues.
Define, lead, and execute technology selections and POCs.

Requirements

More than 7 years of experience in R&D with at least 3 years in a development architecture position
Extensive hands-on experience with Java, Vue/React & Python (C++ - an advantage)
At least 2 years of hands-on experience with cloud technologies (AWS – an advantage)
Experience with DevOps best practices and tools such Jenkins, Terraform, Ansible etc.
Experience in designing high performance, highly available, DR and scalable architecture.
Strong design and development experience with docker & K8S
Experience with data structures, relational and non-relational databases (Postgres and Graph DB – an advantage)
Experience with streaming data (Kafka an advantage)
Experience in breaking monoliths into small components
Experience with Linux environments
Team player and excellent personal skills
Maintain and communicate a big system view.
Excellent communication and presentation skills in Hebrew and English
Previous experience with financial crime solutions – an advantage
AWS Solution Architect certification - an advantage

#LI-Hybrid
 About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
